pages.text: 47|20|Shinkō suru mono-tachi wa,`dōshite 1-shō 〔sūra〕 ga kudatte konai no ka.' To iu. Tokoroga dankotaru 1-shō ga kudasa re, sono Chū de sentō no koto ga nobe rareru to, kokoro ni yamai no yadoru-sha-tachi wa, imanimo shi ni nozomu yōna yowayowashī mabuta de anata o miyou. Wazawaiare (kare-ra wa shinda kata ga ī. )
47|21|Fukujū suru koto to, kōsei ni iu koto (no kata ga daijidearu). Koto (sentō) ga, kettei sa reta toki wa, arrā ni chūseidearu koto ga kare-ra no tame ni yoi.
47|22|Anata gataga, moshi o meirei ni somuki sattari shite, chijō ni taihai o motarashi, mata ketsuen no danzetsu to naru yōna koto o kitai suru no ka.
47|23|Korera no hitobito wa, arrā ga mikagitta mono de, rōa (-sha) ni sa re, sono-me mo mōmoku ni nasa reru.
47|24|Kare-ra wa kuruān o jukudoku ganmi shinai no ka. Soretomo kokoro ni kagi o kaketa no ka.
47|25|Hontōni michibiki ga akiraka ni sa reta nochi sore kara somuki saru mono wa, akuma ni sosonokasa re, ayamatta ganbō no toriko to naru.

47|26|Sore wa kare-ra ga, arrā no kudasa reru mono o kirau mono ni mukatte,`watashi-tachi wa baainiyotte wa, anata gata ni shitagaimashou.' To itta tamedearu. Daga arrā wa kare-ra no himitsu o shitte ora reru.
47|27|Tenshi-tachi ga, kare-ra o meshi yose (shinde shimau koto) kare-ra no kao ya se o uttanara dōdearou ka.
47|28|Sore to iu no mo kare-ra ga arrā no o ikari ni naru koto bakari o okonai, kare no o yorokobi ni nara reru koto o kiratta tame, kare ga kare-ra no okonai o munashiku shita nodearu.
47|29|Soretomo kokoro ni yamai o yadosu mono wa, jibun-tachi no (mitsuna) akui o arrā ga akarumi ni dasa renaito demo kangaeru no ka.
